sources.title: Dragstrip Riot (1958)
sources.description: Yvonne Lime, Gary Clarke, Fay Wray

metadata.Plot: After a run-in with a tough motorcycle gang, where Gary Clarke is blamed when one of the bikers is sent out of control over a cliff, he and his girl are threatened and pursued. On to the beach riot, where the real culprit is unmasked and retaliates with his spear gun.
metadata.Writer: George Hodgins, O'Dale Ireland, Robert Kirch
metadata.Actors: Yvonne Lime, Gary Clarke, Fay Wray
